title: Have You Seen My Duckling?
features: In this classic and bestselling Caldecott Honor winner, a mother duck loses her duckling—and finds it, with the help of sharp-eyed young readers.
“Children will return to this one again and again . . . a reassuring story of youthful independence and familial love.”—
“[Nancy Tafuri] always manages to flavor her splendid pictures with humor and interesting detail.”—
The New York Times Book Review

Acclaimed author Nancy Tafuri hides the little duck somewhere on each page—have YOU seen it? This almost-wordless book is both a fun counting game and an exciting hidden-picture hunt for the youngest readers.
description: An anxious mother duck leads her brood around the pond as she searches for one missing duckling.
Nancy Tafuri's acclaimed picture books for the youngest child include the Caldecott Honor Book
, written by Sharon Phillips Denslow. She lives with her family in Roxbury, Connecticut.
